content.query:
CREATE VIEW [dbo].[CovidDoctorsPer10K]
AS SELECT 
 cc.iso3
 ,cc.Country_Region
,dc.Year
,dc.DoctorsPer10k
 ,lcd.confirmed 
 ,lcd.Deaths
 ,lcd.Recovered
 FROM
 TGT.LatestDoctorCounts dc left join TGT.countrycodes cc on dc.COUNTRY = cc.iso3
 left join TGT.LatestCovidData lcd on cc.Country_Region = lcd.Country_Region
 where iso3 is not NULL;
GO
